meanings.definition: Most resembling silver in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The silveriest necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the silveriest one at the party.
meanings.sent3: The silveriest car in the parking lot was actually made of plastic!
meanings.sent4: The moon cast the silveriest glow over the lake.
meanings.sent5: The silveriest clouds drifted lazily across the sky.

meanings.definition: Most valuable or prestigious in a silver-like manner.
meanings.sent1: The silveriest award was presented to the top student.
meanings.sent2: His watch was the silveriest one in the entire collection.
meanings.sent3: The silveriest trophy turned out to be a fake made of tin!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the silveriest thing he had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The silveriest crown sparkled on the king's head.
